reviews.review: Fun game, even after almost 10 years, but rife with hackers and few updates at this point (other than those money makers).
Крутая игра, чтобы раслабиться после школы.
+ из за операций и чисто для общения)

关于这个优先级，我讲两句：如果你受不了过激言论以及歪瓜，或者你非常喜欢fps，再比如你会经常玩这个游戏，可以买；如果你就是偶尔跟朋友玩玩，那就不建议买这个了。因为就算你买了，这游戏里面内购也数不过来，而且他给你也没有什么奖励，就没必要了。
我就是跟同学玩玩，但是掏钱了，现在有点小后悔。
别被那个免费掉落箱子忽悠了，实际上还得花钱买钥匙才能用。你预期开箱，不如你上buff卖箱子，拿钱买几个十来块钱的皮肤用。个人感觉原皮和便宜皮肤比贵皮肤好看，后者太花哨。
不过，这个优先级对提升队友素质还是很有效的。
very nice to play with russians

It would be a good game if you would ban all russian people. They are very toxic and they don't need in the game! BAN RUSSIA !!!

After getting an unfair cooldown, I would warn everyone.

I have been got a 24hrs cooldown because CS server crashed. Support is useless, they don't help you at all even if you provide some evidences why you couldn't reconnect...

Funny things, I won a competitive match and I was in the board screen. (Literally the match was over). Then they gave me the unfair cooldown...
eu fazia esculturas de barro essa é minha arte
Lejos, el juego que mas rabia me hace pasar. Pero es el mejor first person shooter de la vida
It's an amazing game each game I have loads of fun.

ЛУЧШАЯ ИГРА В КОТОРУЮ Я ИГРАЛ ТОЛЬКО ЧИТЕРЫ БЕСЯТ А ТАК ИДЕАЛ!!!!
CS GO IS  BEST GAME FOR HACKING
Da raiva de jogar, skins são caras, não troco com ninguem mas aconselho a todos jogarem e comprarem

o jogo basicamente não mudou por 10 anos, continua divertido, ver o caos entre seus amigos, a discórdia sendo disseminada na partida.
levanto todos os dias triste e vou dormi com ódio no coração por causa desse jogo, mas essa porra é pior que crack depois que começa você não consegue parar, esse jogo e tipo uma quenga, você sabe que ela te bota chifre mas você continua com ela. Em resumo é um ótimo jogo recomendo.
非常好的游戏，队友都很和蔼包容，残局没打赢都不会生气骂你，还会问候你的母亲。

It's CS:GO, i don't know what to say about this game anymore...
Oyun çok güzel bütün CS severlere öneririm.

If you can find a privat server with friends you can count on...its a great skilled 5vs5 tactical shooter.
Othervise DONT !!!! Because valve doesnt care about you...or the problems with hackers, smufs and other cheaters you will meet 90% of the time you play,
This game is Valve's money milking cow and they only want to secure the flow of money from skins, bought from all the free accounts.
If you report players who cheats they might get banned BUT!!!! they just make a new account ....Valve could solve this by exclude the cheaters ip Address for good....but they are bying skins....
